import{dateToString}from'utilities/Generator';/**
 * 取得本次轉帳的交易轉入帳號資訊。
 * @param {*} transIn
 * @returns {{ bankId, bankName, account, accountName }} 轉入帳號資訊。
 */export var getTransInData=function getTransInData(transIn){var _quickAcct$bankId,_quickAcct$bankName,_quickAcct$accountNo;var quickAcct=[null,transIn.freqAcct,transIn.regAcct][transIn.type];// 常用(freqAcct)/約定(regAcct) 帳號
var data={bank:(_quickAcct$bankId=quickAcct===null||quickAcct===void 0?void 0:quickAcct.bankId)!==null&&_quickAcct$bankId!==void 0?_quickAcct$bankId:transIn.bank,bankName:(_quickAcct$bankName=quickAcct===null||quickAcct===void 0?void 0:quickAcct.bankName)!==null&&_quickAcct$bankName!==void 0?_quickAcct$bankName:transIn.bankName,account:(_quickAcct$accountNo=quickAcct===null||quickAcct===void 0?void 0:quickAcct.accountNo)!==null&&_quickAcct$accountNo!==void 0?_quickAcct$accountNo:transIn.account,accountName:quickAcct===null||quickAcct===void 0?void 0:quickAcct.accountName// 非常用或約定帳號 不會有別名。
};return data;};/**
 * 將轉帳金額加標千分位符號及前置'$'.
 * @param {Number} amount 金額
 */export var getDisplayAmount=function getDisplayAmount(amount){return"$".concat(new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US').format(amount));};/**
 * 產生轉帳發生時間或區間的描述訊息。
 */export var getTransDate=function getTransDate(booking){if(!(booking!==null&&booking!==void 0&&booking.mode))return dateToString(new Date());// 立即轉帳 用今天表示。
var multiTimes=booking.multiTimes,transDate=booking.transDate,transRange=booking.transRange;if(multiTimes==='1'){return"".concat(dateToString(transDate));}return"".concat(dateToString(transRange[0])," ~ ").concat(dateToString(transRange[1]));};/**
 * 產生週期預約轉帳的描述訊息。
 */export var getCycleDesc=function getCycleDesc(booking){var cycleWeekly=['日','一','二','三','四','五','六'];var cycleTiming=booking.cycleTiming;if(booking.cycleMode===1){return"\u6BCF\u5468".concat(cycleWeekly[booking.cycleTiming]);}return"\u6BCF\u500B\u6708".concat(cycleTiming,"\u865F");};
